name: Brick-Eyes Inconsistency Dragon
text:
1 Tuner monster + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters 
 If this card is Synchro Summoned: Skip your next Draw Phase. (Quick Effect) You can banish 1 card from your hand; banish 1 card on the field. You can only use this effect of "Brick-Eyes Inconsistency Dragon" once per turn. This card cannot be destroyed by battle.
